description: Mysore pak with almonds is a fudge-like, lightly nutty Indian sweet treat.
name: Mysore Pak with Almonds Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the ghee in a large saucepan until melted. Heat the sugar with 2 tablespoons of water in a saucepan and boil for 1 minute.

Reduce the heat and add the ground almonds to the sugar syrup and mix well. Add a ladleful of melted ghee, mix well and repeat with ghee until the mixture doesn't absorb any more and is bubbling on the heat. This should take about 10 minutes.
Stir in the cardamom powder, pour the mix into a parchment lined tin and smooth out with a spatula. Leave to cool for 15 minutes, slice and serve.
